about.title: About Prestalink
about.description: PrestaLink is a comprehensive job platform designed to help Algerian citizens realize their career dreams in Europe. Operating since 2018, our platform has helped thousands of Algerian citizens find jobs in Germany, France, Spain, the Netherlands, and other European countries. We provide comprehensive support not only in job searching but also in visa processes, housing solutions, language training, and settlement consulting at every step. With our advanced technology infrastructure, extensive employer network, and experienced team, we ensure that Algerian citizens can relocate to Europe safely and smoothly.
about.missionBody: As PrestaLink, our mission is to provide Algerian citizens with fair, transparent, and reliable job opportunities in Europe and offer comprehensive support throughout the entire settlement process. With our human-centered approach, we understand each candidate's unique needs and provide personalized solutions. We are with you not only in job matching but also in visa application guidance, housing support, cultural integration programs, and post-settlement follow-up services. With our commitment to ethical values, transparent communication, and quality service approach, we ensure that Algerian citizens begin a successful career journey in Europe. We also develop scalable and efficient recruitment programs for employers to reach the right talents.
about.visionBody: Our vision is to become Europe's most trusted and comprehensive job platform by 2026 and become the first choice for Algerian citizens in their settlement process to Europe. We aim to transform international workforce mobility by creating an ecosystem where multilingual talents and ethical employers meet. Through technological innovations and continuous development, we will elevate the user experience to the highest level and optimize job matching processes. We are working to be active in 25+ European countries, achieve 50,000+ successful placements, and reach a 99%+ customer satisfaction rate. We also aim to create long-term value for both candidates and employers while contributing to sustainable development goals.
values: Human-first design: We prioritize our users' needs and experiences in every decision and service. Every feature of our platform is shaped based on real user feedback.
Transparent compliance: We act with openness and honesty in all our processes. We ensure full transparency regarding visa processes, fees, service scope, and employer information.

Partnership with local NGOs: We work with a sense of social responsibility by establishing strong partnerships with local non-governmental organizations, associations, and migration counseling centers in Algeria and Europe. Through these partnerships, we reach a wider audience and demonstrate an approach that respects local cultures.
